mini blue.name: MINI hardtop 4doors
mini blue.bio: 2023 MINI Hardtop 4 Door is our all new Multitone Roof. Now available in 3 different color gradients, Soul Blue, Alpine White or Chili Red.

mini black.name: Mini JCW GP
mini black.bio: The 2022 Mini JCW GP takes 12 seconds to get to 60 mph from a standstill and - seconds for the quarter-mile.

mini red.name: MINI Hardtop 2 doors
mini red.bio: The Mini Cooper 2 Door is showing its age, though, as it was last redesigned nine years ago. In that time, more refined, comfortable and convenient hatchback rivals have come and gone.
